name: iron-barbs

effect.sword_shield: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.legends_arceus: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Inflicts damage on the attacker upon contact with iron barbs.
